com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui

Class GuiText

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.AbstractNode
      • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.AbstractAlignableGuiNode
        • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiText

  • public class GuiText
extends AbstractAlignableGuiNode
    This GUI node represents a label containing text.
    Author:
    Maxstupo

      • renderFirst

        protected void renderFirst(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Description copied from class: AbstractNode
        Called once before AbstractNode.render(Graphics2D) and after all child nodes have had this method called as well.
        This method can be requested to be called next render using AbstractNode.setGraphicsCalculationsDirty().

        This method shouldn't draw anything, it should just use the graphics context to calculate variables (e.g. the dimensions of a string).

        Overrides:
        renderFirst in class AbstractAlignableGuiNode
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics context.
